featured.text: But what they do not realize is that overtreatment—too many scans, too many blood tests, too many procedures—may pose harm.
For example, when the riders scan the band at the Off-Road Adventure, a photo will be taken and sent to their email.
The most compelling support, however, comes from brain scans, which show that color processing areas in the brain light up when these people listen to certain words.

definition.zh_def: 掃描，檢查或讀取某物以獲取信息或圖像。
definition.en_def: To examine or read something in order to obtain information or an image.
definition.example: I will scan the document to send it via email.
